ðŸ“– Summary: Spoolman is a self-hosted web service for managing and monitoring 3D printer filament spools. It integrates with popular 3D printing software like OctoPrint and Klipper/Moonraker to provide real-time updates on filament usage, acting as a centralized database for filament inventory.
